definition: pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
banister/balustrade/cage for animal or prisoner/to transport caged prisoner on a cart

sentences.english: Cool rises at the terrace rail, Lotus flowers'scent is clear, Wind from the water's face makes the wine face sober.
sentences.chinese: 西南月上浮雲散軒檻涼生蓮芰香清水面風來酒面醒。
